description: Oracle Cloud Router and Firewall - Protecting cloud infrastructure with real-time security monitoring, traffic analysis, and threat detection

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (count by (instance)(count by (cpu,instance)(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$node",job=~"$job"})) - avg by (instance)(sum by (mode,instance)(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode='idle',instance=~"$node",job=~"$job"}[5m])))) / count by (instance)(count by (cpu,instance)(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$node",job=~"$job"})) * 100

panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Total network traffic on the WAN and wg0 interfaces IN/OUT for 24 hours
panels.title: WAN Network Traffic 24hours

targets.expr: up{instance="oraclewrt", job="prometheus.scrape.node_exporter"} and (up{instance="oraclewrt", job="prometheus.scrape.node_exporter"} or vector(0))

panels.description:
Network Health is based on a ping data from CollectD against 1.1.1.1. 
If the ping is higher than 50ms, it will turn yellow-ish. If its over 100ms, it will turn red.
panels.title: Network Health

panels.description: Count of how many times in the given range distinct IP addresses were banned to the servers.
panels.title: Banip by City Name/Country
Firewall Blocks (1h)
panels.description: Blocked connections in the last hour

panels.title: BanIP Blocks (1h)
panels.description: IPs blocked by BanIP in the last hour

title: OracleWRT Cloud Gateway
